name: Diseases or conditions declared communicable or dangerous to public health
text:
PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS

     The director of health by rules adopted pursuant to chapter 91, may declare diseases or conditions to be communicable or dangerous to the public health. [L 1911, c 125, §3; RL 1925, §934; RL 1935, §1093; RL 1945, §2304; am L 1949, c 53, §29; RL 1955, §49-1; HRS ; am L 1969, c 152, §1; am L 1981, c 185, §1; am L 1983, c 124, §16; am L 1987, c 265, §1]
